text:
Hi Experts!
We have a quick questionâ€”after submitting our paid Theme for review, we prefer not to publish it before our free theme. Is there a possibility to schedule the theme's publishing?

Hi all!
I am quite new to Themes and CMS overall and am just starting to learn but I wonder if anyone else has similar issue (if it is actually based on the theme or my mistake):

 Quotes cloned from Flow template and adjusted slightly (only in branding and line items properties,etc.) look good when Previewed but the PDF version is super messy (empty pages, poor overall formatting)?
You have to include media queries in your code to specify the print layout.
Have a look at this article, it should help you understand :)

Hi Experts!
How much time this process might take?
it depends on the queue - how many themes have submitted updates that need to be reviewed
